dialog.line: Hoi, ginger nut. How you doing?
[says nothing]
I'm talking to you, specky four eyes ginger nut freckle head! How come you're so unfriendly?
Please don't shout like that on my bus. Maybe he doesn't think the things you call him are friendly.
It's only a joke. He lives down my street. Don't you specky four eyes ginger nut freckle head?
She's so horrible to him. Why doesn't she just leave him alone?
Shush Nadine, she'll hear you.
I don't care.
Specky frecky, freckyspecky. Freckspeck.
Leave him alone.
What's it to you, dread head?
People shouldn't be mean to each other, especially when it's for no reason at all.
Don't be such a wuss. I'm not being mean to him, it's just a laugh.
So who's laughing?
Steve is, aren't you frecky wecky?
Yeah I suppose so. It's okay.
See? He's my mate. He doesn't need you sticking your black nose in.

I'm proud of my black nose and my black skin, so you can call me black any time you like. I don't have a problem with my colour even if you do. What's the colour of my nose got to do with you calling Steve names?
So you think being racist is funny as well do you? I bet you wouldn't say that if Nadine and I were as big as you.
Don't make such a big deal out of it. You'll be reporting me for racist bullying next. Call me names if you want, I don't care.
That's just so clever... NOT. You haven't got freckles, you're not black, you're not fat, you don't wear glasses. What do we call you? Slimmy-whitey-brown hair-nospecs?
Well if you're saying I'm normal and gorgeous, I'm not going to argue.
